alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 12:51PM EST until December 22 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Falls Village. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Water floods Riverside Road at Kent School and begins to approach buildings. Water gets close to Route 7. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Wed 12 pm: 8.6 Forecast: Wed 1 pm 8.6 Wed 7 pm 8.5 Thu 1 am 8.2 Thu 7 am 7.9 Thu 1 pm 7.5 Thu 7 pm 7.1 Fri 1 am 6.8 Fri 7 am 6.6 Fri 1 pm 6.3 Fri 7 pm 6.1 Sat 1 am 5.9 Sat 7 am 5.7 &&
